info.description:
Storage and Send API
First login with user and use authorization as "Bearer JWTTOKEN"

get.description: Get one auth with id or name

patch.description: Patch with a few data, id must exist in request

parameters.description: send part of the user object
parameters.name: payload

get.description: Get one bind with id or name

patch.description: Bind with a few data, id must exist in request

parameters.description: send part of the user object
parameters.name: payload

post.description: Send request with bind id or name

patch.description: Replace with new data, id or name must exist in request

get.description: Get list of the templates, specify key query to get inner paths

parameters.description: set the limit, default is empty
parameters.name: folder

post.description: Send token to check validation, if not valid return 401

get.description: Get one user with id or name

patch.description: Replace with new data, id or name must exist in request

parameters.description: send part of the user object
parameters.name: payload
